MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L38 postcode area of Hightown. affecting properties in North End Lane and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:19pm . Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a damaged underground cable and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:20pm on 16th February 2020.
